Detailed Description

template<class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
class stDFMSTSplitter< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >

This class template implements the DFTree MST split algorithm.

Version
1.0
Date
2005/03/08 19:43:09

template<class ObjectType , class EvaluatorType >
void stDFMSTSplitter< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >::JoinClusters ( int  cluster1,
int  cluster2 
)
protected

Joins 2 clusters. This method will insert custer2 into cluster1.

The state of cluster2 will change to DEATH_SENTENCE.

Parameters
cluster1Cluster 1.
cluster2Cluster 2.
template<class ObjectType , class EvaluatorType >
void stDFMSTSplitter< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >::PerformMST ( tGR *  GR)
protected

Performs the MST algorithm. This method will split the objects in 2 clusters. The result of the processing will be found at the array Cluster.

Parameters
GRUsed to find GR at first split
Warning
DMat must be initialized.
